content.prompt: Sam pays monthly installments on a five-year fixed interest rate auto loan. If the expected inflation rate increases, which of the following will happen?

choices.label: Sam will pay a lower nominal interest rate.
Sam will pay a higher nominal interest rate.
Sam will pay a lower real interest rate.
Sam will pay a higher real interest rate.
Sam will pay higher monthly installments.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
